name: Elevating Over It
description:
This game is intended for the #LudwigJam hosted by Ottomated.  It was developed in one night on the day leading up to the submission deadline.

You have a hot date on the 10th floor of this elevator, but every time it stops on a floor, a reaction time test appears and if you fail it, for some reason the elevator drops down a floor, and only gets to the top if you succeed!

git: a3qz/elevator-game (github.com)
